title: $:/plugins/OokTech/SubmitForm
author: OokTech
name: SubmitForm
description: A simple action widget that lets you submit http form data
readme:
<$button class="tc-btn-invisible" style="overflow: hidden;white-space: pre;width: 100%;" message="tm-open-external-window" param="https://github.com/OokTech/TW5-SubmitForm">{{$:/core/images/github}} <$text text="https://github.com/OokTech/TW5-SubmitForm"/></$button>

This is a widget that can send http form data for tiddlywiki.
